title: 12: R.E.M.
itunes:title: R.E.M.
description: Joe welcomes R.E.M.'s Michael Stipe and Mike Mills to the pod on the 25th anniversary of "New Adventures in Hi-Fi" to discuss their musical journey, how grassroots politics are essential to protecting American democracy and why social media giants are the robber barons of our time.
itunes:author: The Joe Scarborough Podcast
dc:creator: The Joe Scarborough Podcast
